name: Weimar Bartender Prototype
description:
This is just a rough prototype for a bartender game along the lines of VA-11 Hall-A and Coffee Talk.  I loved those games and wanted to try my hand at coding a drink-mixing system.

Unfortunately, there's no content in here right now beyond mixing a few different kinds of drinks for Mae, but I hope to eventually be able to expand this into a complete narrative game with more characters, more ingredients, a story, and so on.

Credits:

Meagan Trott - art, programming, writing
Kira/Ki Willow - programming consultant

Created for NaNoRenO2020+ with Ren'Py

Content Advisory: alcohol
